mapper.sql: id, investor_id, platform_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_duration, project_duration_unit, profit_ratio, deducted, Interest_coupon, cash_coupon,arrived, investment, is_remind, bank_card_id, balance_due, is_expired, notes, created_id, modified_id, created, modified,repayment_method,month_index,repayment_day
mapper.select:
select sum(i.investment)/100 investment, ip.name platformName from investment i, investment_platform ip where i.platform_id = ip.id
and i.is_expired = 0
and i.is_expired = 1
and i.investor_id = #{investorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
group by i.platform_id

select ROUND(sum((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)*datediff(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) profit , ip.name platformName from investment i, investment_platform ip where i.platform_id = ip.id
and i.is_expired = 1
and i.is_expired = 0
and i.investor_id = #{investorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
group by i.platform_id

select ROUND(sum(i.investment)/100, 2) investment , ip.name platformName, i.investor_id investorId from investment i, investment_platform ip where i.platform_id = ip.id
and i.is_expired = 1
and i.is_expired = 0
and i.investor_id = #{investorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
group by i.investor_id, i.platform_id

SELECT t1.investorId ,t1.platformName ,t1.investment ,t1.deducted ,t1.profit ,t1.currentProfit ,t1.principalAndInterest ,t1.investmentAmount ,t1.dailyProfit ,(t1.investment+t1.deducted+t1.currentProfit)+(t1.yearEndDateDiff*t1.dailyProfit) yearEndEarn ,t2.totalInvestment ,t2.totalDeducted ,t2.totalCurrentProfit ,t2.totalPrincipalAndInterest ,t2.totalProfit ,t2.totalInvestmentAmount FROM ( SELECT ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) profit , ROUND(SUM(i.investment)/100, 2) investment , ROUND(SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) deducted , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(now(), i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) currentProfit , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000 + SUM(i.investment)/100 + SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) principalAndInterest , COUNT(i.id) investmentAmount , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon))/365/10000, 2) dailyProfit , DATEDIFF(str_to_date(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'),'-12-31 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), now()) yearEndDateDiff , ip.name platformName , ip.id pid , i.investor_id investorId FROM investment i, investment_platform ip WHERE i.platform_id = ip.id
and i.is_expired = 0
GROUP BY i.investor_id, i.platform_id) t1 , ( SELECT ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) totalProfit , ROUND(SUM(i.investment)/100, 2) totalInvestment , ROUND(SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) totalDeducted , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(case when (i.end_date is null or i.end_date > now()) then now() else i.end_date end, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) totalCurrentProfit , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000 + SUM(i.investment)/100 + SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) totalPrincipalAndInterest , COUNT(i.id) totalInvestmentAmount , ip.name platformName , ip.id pid , i.investor_id investorId FROM investment i, investment_platform ip WHERE i.platform_id = ip.id GROUP BY i.investor_id, i.platform_id) t2 WHERE t1.investorId = t2.investorId AND t1.pid = t2.pid

SELECT t1.investorId ,t1.investment ,t1.deducted ,t1.profit ,t1.arrived ,t1.currentProfit ,t1.principalAndInterest ,t1.investmentAmount ,t1.dailyProfit ,(t1.investment+t1.deducted+t1.currentProfit)+(t1.yearEndDateDiff*t1.dailyProfit) yearEndEarn ,t2.totalInvestment ,t2.totalDeducted ,t2.totalCurrentProfit ,t2.totalPrincipalAndInterest ,t2.totalProfit ,t2.totalInvestmentAmount FROM ( SELECT ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) profit , ROUND(SUM(i.investment)/100, 2) investment , ROUND(SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) deducted , ROUND(SUM(i.arrived)/100, 2) arrived , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(now(), i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) currentProfit , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000 + SUM(i.investment)/100 + SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) principalAndInterest , COUNT(i.id) investmentAmount , i.investor_id investorId , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon))/365/10000, 2) dailyProfit , DATEDIFF(str_to_date(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'),'-12-31 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), now()) yearEndDateDiff FROM investment i
WHERE i.is_expired = 0
GROUP BY i.investor_id) t1 , ( SELECT ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) totalProfit , ROUND(SUM(i.investment)/100, 2) totalInvestment , ROUND(SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) totalDeducted , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(case when (i.end_date is null or i.end_date > now()) then now() else i.end_date end, i.start_date))/365/10000, 2) totalCurrentProfit , ROUND(SUM((i.investment+i.deducted)*(i.profit_ratio+i.interest_coupon)* DATEDIFF(i.end_date, i.start_date))/365/10000 + SUM(i.investment)/100 + SUM(i.deducted)/100, 2) totalPrincipalAndInterest , COUNT(i.id) totalInvestmentAmount , i.investor_id investorId FROM investment i GROUP BY i.investor_id) t2 WHERE t1.investorId = t2.investorId
